TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CatalogPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part
Public MustInherit Class CatalogPart Inherits Part

summary.span: 作為 區域中控制項的基底類別，並提供使用者可以加入網頁中的可用 Web 伺服器控制項 (特別是 控制項) 目錄。

span.span: Serves as the base class for controls that reside in zones, and that provide catalogs of available Web server controls (especially controls) that users can add to a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是位於特殊控制項的基底類別區域。The class is a base class for special controls that reside in zones. 這些衍生控制項提供的使用者可以加入至網頁的 Web 伺服器控制項的目錄。These derived controls provide catalogs of Web server controls that end users can add to a Web page. 使用中的 Web 應用程式，當您想要提供使用者彈性地變更網頁上的功能，藉由新增或移除伺服器控制項的控制項。Use controls in a Web application when you want to provide end users with the flexibility to change the functionality of a Web page by adding or removing server controls. 目錄是只要一或多個可用的 Web 伺服器控制項的清單 (包括控制項、 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項和自訂或使用者控制項) 使用者可以加入至網頁。A catalog is simply a list of one or more available Web server controls (including controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom or user controls) that users can add to a Web page. 目錄具有一些共同的特性，包括指示文字的使用者;文字說明每個伺服器控制項;選取的伺服器控制項，並將其加入至頁面; 的協助程式控制項常見的標頭、 頁尾和框線;和樣式屬性的數目。A catalog has a number of common characteristics, including instruction text for end users; text to describe each server control; helper controls to select the server controls and add them to the page; a common header, footer, and border; and a number of style attributes. 有三種類型的提供 Web 組件控制項集合中，使用下表中所述的控制項。There are three types of controls provided with the Web Parts control set, as described in the following table. 每一種控制項包含會加入至頁面上，從不同來源的伺服器控制項。Each type of control contains server controls that are added to a page from a different source. > [!IMPORTANT] > 繼承的控制項類別僅可以位於區域衍生自類別。Controls that inherit from the class can reside only in zones derived from the class. |控制項Control|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||包含的控制項的頁面上，已關閉，且可以由使用者重新開啟 （已的重新新增到網頁）。Contains controls that have been closed on a page, and that can be reopened (added back to the page) by users. 這種類型中的控制項是目錄的控制項，已經新增至頁面從其他來源，並由使用者關閉。The controls in this type of catalog are controls that were already added to the page from another source, and were then closed by a user.| ||包含伺服器控制項宣告內控制項，本身包含在Web 網頁標記中的區域。Contains server controls declared within a control, which is itself contained in a zone in the markup of a Web page.| ||使用者介面 (UI) 為使用者提供的控制項定義檔案 （結構描述，其中包含狀態資訊所定義的 XML 檔案） 上傳至目錄，以便可以將控制項加入至網頁。Provides the user interface (UI) for a user to upload a control's definition file (an XML file defined by a schema, that contains state information) to a catalog, so that the control can be added to a Web page. 這種類型的目錄; 中看不到控制項本身目錄是一個機制來存取外部控制項的定義檔，因此它們可以加入至頁面。The controls themselves do not appear in this type of catalog; the catalog is just a mechanism for accessing the definition files for external controls so they can be added to a page.| 類別繼承自基底類別，使其具有 Web 組件控制項集合中的其他組件控制項的一般行為。The class inherits from the base class, so that it has the common behavior of other part controls in the Web Parts control set. 此外，它會新增適用於類別目錄功能的某些成員。In addition, it adds some members that are useful for the catalog functionality. 屬性會取得目前顯示為標題控制項的實際字串。The property gets the actual string that is currently being displayed as the title of the control. 這個屬性的值可以是相同的值為屬性或者，如果已不指派給此屬性時，.NET Framework 所提供的預設值的任何值。The value of this property can be the same as the value of the property or, if no value has been assigned to that property, a default value supplied by the .NET Framework. 及這兩個屬性會提供方便的存取控制的生命週期的兩個必要物件控制項：控制項，而包含區域控制，分別。The and properties both provide convenient access to the two essential objects that control the life cycle of a control: the control, and the zone that contains the control, respectively. 類別也包含數種方法。The class also contains several methods. 方法宣告為抽象方法必須由繼承者實作。The method is declared as an abstract method that must be implemented by inheritors. 其目的是在目錄中傳回控制項的描述的集合。Its intended purpose is to return a collection of descriptions of the controls in the catalog. 相關的方法，也已宣告為抽象，必須由繼承者實作。A related method, , is also declared as abstract and must be implemented by inheritors. 這個方法要傳回的執行個體控制項根據傳遞至方法，做為參數的描述。This method is intended to return an instance of a control based on a description that is passed to the method as a parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class. 類別是抽象的因為它不會使用直接在程式碼中。Because the class is abstract, it is not used directly in code. 不過，此範例示範如何使用衍生的三個提供示範常見使用案例設定的 Web 組件控制項的控制項。However, the example shows how to work with the three derived controls provided with the Web Parts control set to demonstrate common usage scenarios. 有四個部分的程式碼範例：There are four parts to the code example: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更網頁上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on the Web page. - 網頁，其中包含三個提供與 Web 組件控制項集合，所有宣告內的控制項網頁上。A Web page, which contains the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set, all declared within a on a Web page. 這個頁面也包含控制項，與區域中宣告的控制項。The page also contains a control, with an control declared in the zone. - XML 檔案，其中包含顯示在的引號在網頁上的控制項。An XML file that contains quotations displayed in the control on the Web page. - 如何執行範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the example. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 您應該將此程式碼儲存在名為 DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx 或 DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx （根據哪一個語言使用）。You should save this code in a file named DisplayModeMenuCS.ascx or DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx (depending on which language you are using). For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_CatalogPart_Overview/VB/displaymodemenuvb.ascx#5)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是網頁。The second part of the code example is the Web page. 此頁面包含控制項和子系內``項目，這三控制項提供宣告與網頁組件控制項集合。The page contains a control, and within the child `` element, each of the three controls provided with the Web Parts control set is declared. 某些屬性上設定控制項，同時也位於\<指令碼 > 頁面，該控制項上的屬性區段會以程式設計方式存取。Some attribute are set on the control, and also in the \

para.span: 因為類別是抽象的您無法直接在網頁上使用它。

span.span: Because the class is abstract, you cannot use it directly on a Web page.

para.span: Web 組件控制項集合提供三個衍生自的基底類別 （列於本主題的 < 備註 > 一節的表格） 的控制項，並可用於在網頁組件頁面上。

span.span: The Web Parts control set provides three controls (listed in the table in the Remarks section of this topic) that derive from the base class and that can be used on Web Parts pages.

para.span: 這些控制項應該提供大部分建立類別目錄中，Web 伺服器控制項所需的功能。

span.span: These controls should provide most of the features needed to create catalogs of Web server controls.

para.span: 不過，您可能會有特殊需要需要開發自訂控制項。

span.span: However, you might have specialized needs that would require developing a custom control.

para.span: 例如，您可以建立一種特殊型別的，可透過 Web 服務，或直接從資料庫讓伺服器控制項的控制項。

span.span: For example, you can create a special type of control that makes server controls available through a Web service, or directly from a database.

para.span: 若要這樣做，您必須繼承自類別。

span.span: To do this, you must inherit from the class.

para.span: 您也必須覆寫抽象並方法，以提供可實作來傳回或其他伺服器控制項，以及它們的描述。

span.span: You must also override the abstract and methods to provide an implementation that returns the or other server controls, and their descriptions.

para.span: 您也必須從您的資料庫或 Web 服務載入各種不同的伺服器控制項的方法。

span.span: You will also need methods to load the various server controls from your database or Web service.

related.span: 逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂伺服器控制項

span.span: Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Server Control

related.span: 逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式

span.span: Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

summary.span: 初始化這個類別，以供繼承的類別執行個體使用。

span.span: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.

summary.span: 這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別呼叫。

span.span: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DisplayTitle As String
public: property System::String ^ DisplayTitle { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得字串，該字串包含 控制項的實際目前標題。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the actual current title of a control.

value.span: 字串，表示控制項的完整可見標題。

span.span: A string that represents the complete, visible title of the control.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回之目前值的基底屬性或，如果控制項沒有標題，導出值。The property returns either the current value of the base property or, if the control has no title, a calculated value. 屬性設計為唯讀、 導出的屬性，以在執行階段取得顯示項目的目前實際的值。The property is designed to be a read-only, calculated property to get the actual current value of the displayed title at run time. 因此，您應該嘗試使用這個屬性來設定的標題控制項。Therefore, you should not attempt to use this property to set a title for a control. 若要設定標題，請使用 基底屬性。To set a title, use the base property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 在`

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescriptionCollection GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions() cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetAvailableWebPartDescriptions () As WebPartDescriptionCollection

summary.span: 傳回目錄中可用 控制項的描述集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of descriptions of the available controls in a catalog.

returns.span: ，包含目錄中每一個控制項的 。

span.span: A that contains a for each control in a catalog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回目錄中的每個控制項的描述資訊。The method returns description information for each control in a catalog. A物件是輕量型物件，其中包含有關的基本資訊控制項，包括其識別碼、 將控制項，然後繼承自基底的數個重要屬性的值的物件參考類別，例如和。A object is a lightweight object that contains essential information about a control, including its ID, an object reference to the control, and the values of several important properties that are inherited from the base class, such as and . 方法可以改善效能。The method improves performance. 建立目錄時，它必須包含，包括標題、 描述、 圖示 （如果有的話） 和識別碼。 每個控制項的一些資訊When a catalog is created, it needs some information about each control it contains, including a title, a description, an icon (if one exists), and an ID. 呼叫端可以使用，而不必建立的每個控制項，以取得這項資訊執行個體方法，這個方法會傳回只描述的相關資訊的每個控制項。Rather than having to create an instance of each control to get this information, a caller can use the method, which returns only the description information about each control.

para.span: 方法是抽象的因此它必須實作衍生控制項。

span.span: The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls.

para.span: 會呼叫這個方法所包含的區域控制項，並由相關聯物件時的內容區域會呈現。

span.span: This method is called by the zone that contains a control, and by an associated object when the contents of a zone are rendered.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

Protected Overrides Function GetDesignModeState () As IDictionary

summary.span: 擷取 控制項之父區域的目前狀態。

span.span: Retrieves the current state of a control's parent zone.

returns.span: ，包含 區域的目前狀態，該區域含有 控制項。

span.span: An that contains the current state of the zone that contains a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回包含之區域的狀態資訊控制項。The method returns information about the state of the zone that contains a control. 字典的表單中，會傳回狀態資訊。The state information is returned in the form of a dictionary.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart GetWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDescription description) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetWebPart (description As WebPartDescription) As WebPart

span.span: A that contains a reference to a specific .

summary.span: 從目錄擷取 控制項，該控制項由傳遞至方法的 物件參考。

span.span: Retrieves from a catalog the control that is referenced by the object passed to the method.
A that is referenced by the object in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回從類別目錄的控制項。The method returns a control from a catalog. 傳遞給方法的物件符合特定控制項和控制項加入方法所傳回的啟用。The object that is passed to the method matches a specific control and enables that control to be returned by the method. 如果目錄包含伺服器控制項不是衍生自類別，例如 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項、 自訂伺服器控制項或使用者控制項控制項必須包裝給伺服器控制項控制項，並傳回從這個方法的控制項。If a catalog contains a server control that does not derive from the class, such as an ASP.NET server control, a custom server control, or a user control, a control must wrap the server control with a control, and return the control from this method.

para.span: 方法是抽象的因此它必須實作衍生控制項。

span.span: The method is abstract, so it must be implemented by derived controls.

para.span: 會呼叫這個方法所包含的區域控制項，由相關聯物件，並依據網頁上的物件。

span.span: This method is called by the zone that contains a control, by an associated object, and by the object on a Web page.
ASP.NET Web Parts Pages

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓控制項來取得其區域的參考。The property enables a control to get a reference to its zone. 屬性是唯讀的雖然可以以程式設計方式變更區域本身的基底屬性。Although the property is read-only, the underlying properties of the zone itself can be changed programmatically.
